summary:
I am a very experienced all round HR professional, in recent years I specialized in the field of integration, change management and conflicts. This goes beyond the HR area only. In short, energetic, enthusiastic and a mediator.

Specialties: 
Trade Union 
Recruitment worldwide
Inhousing procedures
Labour law
Consultation works councils 
Organization redirecting 
Social plans 
Growth
Reorganization streamlining processes integrate cultures merge

profile_positions.description:
Conduent is a company’s expertise in connecting clients and their constituents through seamless transactions in areas such as customer care, transportation solutions, and healthcare payer and provider services.

Besides HR end responsible for The Netherlands, I am responsible for Project, Policies and Compliance for EMEA. I work in the Netherlands but also worldwide.

I am the contact person for all questions, challenges and development of the HR team members. I fulfil a coaching role within the company and am energised by people-related issues. 
As HR Manager, I support the board and senior management. I also set out strategic lines in terms of developing and implementing human resources policy and make an active contribution to the organisational strategy. 
I also recognise and acknowledge needs; together with my HR team, we devise and implement solutions. 
As HR manager, it is important that I closely follow new developments in labour law and labour market trends and implement them in Conduent's policy.

Furthermore, I determine HR requirements and redesign the HR department and manage my team.

Other topics:
Restructuring training of indirect employees
Reduce retention
Structure the inflow
New sickness procedure policy and new health & safety policy
Propose, set up and implement an annual incentive scheme for specific departments / functions
Review and implement company policies and regulations

Set up and implement employee development and training programmes, etc.
profile_positions.title: HR Country lead and EMEA Responsible for Policy, Procedure and Compliance

company.name: Ace Tankers C.V. & ASM Maritime B.V.

profile_positions.company: Ace Tankers C.V. & ASM Maritime B.V.
profile_positions.description:
ACE Tankers is a dynamic fast growing Chemical Tankers owner and operator. ASM Maritime is a global ship management company, providing comprehensive management services to leading ship owners and operators around the globe.

Working in close cooperation with the CEO’s of both Ace Tankers and ASM Maritime, besides handling all day-to-day HR-related activities and issues.

Further determine the HR requirements and set up of the HR department, 
HR as first and frontline advisor of management and employees
Review and renew the Performance Appraisal scheme and ensure roll-out in October / November
Propose, set-up and implement an annual incentive scheme for specific departments / positions
Analyze and determine KPI and manpower planning & retention plans in view of projected future
growth and expansion of company activities
Review and implement company policies and regulations, and introduce a Personnel Handbook;
Set up and implement employee development & training programs
Set up a plan for communication 
Propose plans for a HR budget
Set up an office HSEQ program
Review the companies’ payroll process
Responsible for the salary payment
Responsible for all facility management
Responsible for pension and all insurance (building, travel and employees insurance)
profile_positions.title: HR Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Setting up and managing the HR and salary department 
•	Member Management Team
•	Managing HR due diligence of two take overs
•	Setting up Service department for business customers
•	Responsible for setting up and implementing of salary building
•	Leading a reorganization of indirect staff, aiming to professionalize the organization (aising the   
        qualities of the employees) and improve employee mobility ( right employee in right function)
•	Responsible for the overall recruitment (100 employees in 9 months for  7  locations)
•	Responsible for Belgium employees (Belgium labour law).
•	Develop well-being policy and program for employees, including development of vitality 
        challenge and life style course for employees (sick leave decreased from 11% to 4%)
•	Setting up and implementing employee training program for legally required codes
•	Key contact person for Works Council and Unions
